sourcesContent:
Username:

Username is required!

Username shold be londer than 5 characters!

Firstname:

Firstname is required!

Firstname shold be londer than 2 characters!

Secondname:

Secondname is required!

Secondname shold be londer than 2 characters!

Lastname:

Lastname is required!

Lastname shold be londer than 2 characters!

Email:

Email is required!

Phone:

Phone is required!

Phone shold be londer than 9 characters!

Country:

Country is required!

Country shold be londer than 2 characters!

Place:

Place is required!

Place shold be londer than 2 characters!

Postcode:

Postcode is required!

Postcode shold be londer than 2 characters!

Street:

Street is required!

Street shold be londer than 3 characters!
